places_with_reviews.name: Bhalkeshawar Mandir

reviews.text: Bhalki was also called Bahulingeshwar( Bahuguni) because there were 12 Shivling in Bhalki, out of which one Shivling is present in this temple. For example, Shivling like Sangameshwara, Khadkeshwara, Bhalakeshwara are situated. Those temples were broken by the invaders, so whatever the old temple is, their architecture was damaged. The architectural account of the gatekeepers of this temple is identical to that of Basavanna Bhagyavadi Temple.

Om shree bhalkeshwar prassan
It is one of the famous Temple in Bhalki town, peaceful place , Good place for meditation, peaceful place. By this god name the town name became as Bhalki.

A VERY OLD SHIVA TEMPLE AND KNOWN FOR ITS POSITIVE ENERGY AND YOU CAN FEEL THE ENERGY , IF YOU HAVE EVER BEEN HERE THEN THAT IS WONDERFULL AND I HOPE YOU ENJOYED AND HERE YOU CAN LOT OF OTHERE THINGS LIKE MEDITATION , POOJA AND EVEN YOU CAN SWIM IN THE WELL WHICH IS VERY TO THE TEMPLE AND FROM THIS TEMPLE THE BUSSTAND IS JUST 20 STEPS .
Holi and peaceful place..
This is bhalkeshawar temple in bhalki there is big well beside the temple this well is called (jharbhai) there is a small fort called (gadee) it's very old fort

places_with_reviews.name: Jesus the Holy Redeemer Church

reviews.text:
This is a good gathering of the native folk. Entire congregation sings and clap throughout, and the choir is equipped with folk instruments like harmonium, cymbals, tambourine etc. It is melodious and vibrant ambience all through.
This Church premise also houses Infant Jesus' Shrine in which people adore him as a village deity by ringing the bell and offering incense.
Wonderful place of worship. It's a shrine dedicated to Infant Jesus. Many people are healed because of their faith.
The place of peace
Not seen church he is monk of bhudism
Beautiful place of worship
